subject: Order delivery
description_text:
Hello,
I guess You guys got a lot of orders for the black week. But could You tell
me about when you gonna get restocked and deliver? It's been almost 2 weeks
and I just would like to know when more or less expect it :)

Thanks in advance and best regards

conversations.body_text: Hi Kinga Łączna,  Could you please provide your order number? I’ll check which country it’s from and track the delivery status for you.

Hello, the order number is #SSN3542 :)
I already received the elastomers, but on the track info it claims the
pedals were not send yet

Thanks for quick reply :)

pt., 28 lis 2025, 04:15 użytkownik service@simsonn.com
Hi Kinga Łączna,    I'm terribly sorry for the delay in replying. Your parcel has now been dispatched via DHL.  https://www.dhl.com/us-en/home/tracking.html?tracking-id=CE326634715DE
